text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== In May 1934, when Kanazawa was a Kyoto Imperial University student, he was selected the Japan national team for Far Eastern Championship Games in Manila. At this competition, on May 13, he debuted against Dutch East Indies. On May 15, he also played against Philippines. He played 2 games for Japan in 1934. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1934||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Hiroshi Kanazawa
